resources.string: Introducing a dynamic brother sister realtor team with combined buying and selling talents never before experienced by Victoria and its surrounding communities.\nVictoria Realtors Katherine Gray and Patrick Hossack present as a team with ability and competence that thoroughly complement each other. Their team relationship is based on 30 plus years of being each other’s strongest support. Both have combined years of knowledge and experience of the Greater Victoria market giving their clients confidence when buying or selling their home.\nAs members of The Agency Real Estate Group, we have access to the most up to date information to ensure we can meet your goals. If you’re currently looking for a real estate agent, you can learn more about us by clicking below.
